message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too lopsided. I'm proposing a more balanced 55-45 split. Let's get this done.
I'll meet you halfway between our previous offers. 58-42 is a fair compromise.
Time is running out, and the pot is shrinking. I'm willing to go 52-48. Take it or leave it.
I'm willing to concede a bit more, but I still think I deserve the larger share. 57-43 is my final compromise before things get ugly.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  The pot is shrinking fast.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
